title: T206s For Sale Carrigan AB and White Sov
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: T206s For Sale Carrigan AB and White Sov
posts.post_content:
I have two T206s for sale. Carrigan AB 350 in gd/gd+ and Doc White portrait graded SGC 50 with a Sovereign back. The White has a slight image shift which is more evident in person than in the scan. Price on the Carrigan is 135/bo and White is 70/bo.
                                      Thanks,
                                       Steve
